title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead body: Seeing a dead body in a dream

preview.html: We show you a dream about a body cut into pieces. A dream about seeing corpses in most cases indicates sadness and misfortune, except in very few cases. Whoever sees a person, whether male or female, that there is a corpse of a dead person that he does not know, or a group of corpses, and there is fear or terror in him, then this indicates disagreements with those close to him, or he is suffering from the following things. In his next life. It was said: The dream indicates the dreamer’s backwardness in his religion and his right to worship. Whoever sees corpses and feels intense fear or tries to escape from them, he will find himself in a difficult situation such as illness or prison. Escaping from a corpse indicates distance from God and extreme weakness in religion. Seeing corpses in a public place or in a place frequented by most people, such as markets, streets, empty squares, and forests, is related to the health of business and indicates difficulties at work or the viewer’s low rank and status. In his art, it may indicate a lack of nutrition, a decline in resolve, or the insult he receives due to his shortcomings at work. Seeing a corpse in a shroud or a coffin lying around, if he is very afraid of it, then he is a person whose heart has met and it is a reminder of the afterlife and death to correct his conditions and his condition after it. He distanced himself from his religion, and whoever was satisfied with that insisted on consuming forbidden money and committing sins, and this is a harbinger of God. If the dead person wears black clothes, this is a message to the fortuneteller that his death is near or death is very close to him. Seeing the corpse inside the house, if it is in the place where guests are received, this indicates If there is an evil person entering the house and afflicting his family with bad or trouble. If it is in the cooking place, then the woman is deceiving the person in the house, either out of envy or magic, or an indication that one of the women of the house is approaching because they are the ones who work in that place. If the corpse is in a room Sleeping, this is a cancellation of family happiness, and expect marital problems and weak affection and compassion for a period of time. If the corpse in the dream is on the roof of the house, and if it is of a known person, then the absent person will come before them or a family member will leave them. If it is on the stairs of the house or around it, it means loss of money Which is transferred from their money to the people around them. Anyone who knows the owner of the corpse that he sees in front of him, this may indicate that the deceased is doing something wrong to others, needs help, or needs someone to correct his path with advice. If the corpse belongs to a family member or relative, then the time Someone is approaching. If it is for a friend and acquaintance, then it is a need for the soul of the seer or the deceased who needs help, but it is difficult for the other party. Seeing a corpse cut up and separated from parts of the body, such as the separation of the head, ear, or limbs, indicates the difficulties and hardships faced by the fortuneteller. It was said that a misfortune was orchestrated by him. Hypocrisy or an enemy close to God in his dealings with him. Ibn Sirin sees a corpse in a dream - YouTubeSeeing a headless corpse in a dream - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing tea cups in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing tea cups in a dream by Ibn Sirinana What I mean: Seeing a cup of tea in a dream indicates a stable and secure life and indicates calm and peaceful comfort in the life of the dreamer. It also indicates goodness that will come to him from where he does not expect it and money will go to him without effort, fatigue and suffering. Says the great work of Muhammad ibn Sherine said that seeing tea cups in a dream indicates kindness and abundance of sustenance, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about washing tea cups for single women: If an unmarried girl sees a full tea cup in her dream, this indicates her marriage to a good, wealthy man and from the upper classes. Also, seeing cups Empty tea indicates confusion, instability, and moving from an old home to a new, strange home. Perhaps a cup of tea with milk in a dream indicates the death of worry and worry that the dreamer sees in his life, and indicates comfort and confidence. Also, if an unmarried girl sees herself buying cups of tea In a dream, this indicates her close marriage with the person she loves. Interpretation of seeing tea cups in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is buying tea cups, this indicates her stable and happy marriage, and God knows best. Also, seeing a full cup of tea in a dream indicates the collapse of problems And worries for the pioneer and the beginning of a new and peaceful life. Seeing tea cups and mugs in a dream is an invitation and a sign to urge the person who sees them in a dream to be active and work hard. Seeing her husband drinking tea shows interest in her life and her reforms to live a better life, whether for him or his family. Empty cups Dream InterpretationThe interpretation Seeing empty tea cups in a dream is evidence of a close relationship and marriage, which is good and happy news. Seeing empty tea cups in a dream also indicates that the dreamer is spending his money and wasting it on useless things. Seeing tea cups in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that the dreamer will achieve his goals. And he achieves his dreams. Interpretation of a dream about buying a set of glasses for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman buying a set of glasses in a dream means that she will have an easy birth without any problems. Also, seeing herself buying a set of glasses in a dream is one of the desired visions and an indication of her nourishing a disease-free child. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: What you do not know about dream interpretation of fatigue and exhaustion in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fatigue in a dreamThe interpretation of dreaming of fatigue in a dream can be sought by many because of their temptation by these visions in a dream, but this does not mean that a person sees in a dream that there is a problem that will face his health in reality, but these interpretations differ according to the vision and the person who sees it. A dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin shows that illness or fatigue have different meanings. If someone dreams of someone who he knows is tired, this indicates that there is a rivalry between him and the vision that may reflect an ugly trait in that person, which is narcissism and self-love. The extent of selfishness and condescension towards people and treating them inhumanely. When a person dreams that he has a disease and does not feel any pain in any part of his body, the meaning of the vision is that he did not die soon. The sign of illness according to Ibn Sirin indicates well-being, and if the dreamer sees in a dream that one The members of his family or family had an illness, so God forgave him and healed him. The purpose of the dream is that it is a bad thing and is considered a bad omen that the child who appeared in the vision will die soon. If a married man dreams that his two children are sick in the vision, this is a symbol that he will soon be affected by conjunctivitis. If the dreamer sees That his father is in pain and suffering from an illness, then the intent of this vision indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a headache. If the illness is widespread among people in the dream, then this is a sign of poverty and unhappiness in their lives. Eye disease in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s crying and unhappiness during wakefulness, and whoever dreams If the disease is concentrated in the nose area, then this evil will happen to him soon. Heart disease in a dream is a sign of lack of faith and the dreamer’s lies and hypocrisy with everyone around him. Fatigue in a single woman’s dream. The interpreters said that illness or fatigue in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates sadness and if she dreams If the disease is in the head area, this is a sign of sins, and in the current period she will need to wash away her sins with repentance and ask for forgiveness from mercy, and the vision sends the dreamer an important message that charity is a medicine for many diseases. It is also important for the forgiveness of sins, and therefore it is necessary to do it and insist on it. If you dream in a dream that the forehead or forehead area is a place of pain or illness, then the dream will indicate a shaky position, a weak fate, and a weak position in front of people. Since the ear is the organ responsible for hearing Therefore, if an unmarried woman dreams that the pain in the dream is related to her ears, this is a clear indication that she will hear what does not make her happy, as she could be. She will be exposed to many hurtful words that her enemies will say about her, and this will hurt her greatly. Jurists agree that teeth and molars in a dream are among the signs that are interpreted by relatives, whether they are first- or second-degree relatives. If a virgin dreams that the disease is in her body and not in her head, then this is a good dream. It means that her offspring after marriage will be many, and her share of money and livelihood will also be great. Interpretation of seeing fatigue in a dream: Seeing a person in a dream that he is suffering from excessive fatigue, this indicates that this person is dealing with a great deal of hypocrisy through...

title: Interpretation of seeing a quarrel with one’s mother

preview.html: The interpretation of a quarrel with the mother is one of the common visions that many of us see in our dreams. The mother conveys important warning messages to the person who sees it. We will learn through this article in the encyclopedia about the interpretation of this dream in detail according to the different interpretations of clerics and dream interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the vision of a quarrel. With the mother in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says: If a person dreams that he is arguing with his father and insulting him, this means that he will lick him and deviate from obeying them, but if a person dreams that he is arguing with his father and mother, this indicates his will. He faces many critical and severe problems. But if one sees in a dream that he and his parents are arguing and fighting because of the actions he performs, this means that the dreamer is committing many actions that do not satisfy the father and mother. But if one sees that he is arguing with his wife’s mother, this indicates However, he has a lot of negative feelings towards her, and this vision also shows hatred and incompatibility between them. Interpretation of seeing a quarrel with the mother in an unmarried girl’s dream: Dream interpretation lawyers say that seeing a quarrel with the mother in an unmarried girl’s dream means that you will hear a lot of disturbing news that It will cause you great anxiety and sadness. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is arguing with someone and hitting him, then this vision shows marriage to that person and shows great happiness in her life with that person and that he will treat her kindly, saving her from a lot of trouble. If an unmarried girl sees that she is quarreling with One of her family members, this indicates that this person does not love her and harbors hatred and hatred towards her, and the relationship between them will end in many problems. Interpretation of seeing a quarrel in a married woman’s dream: Dream interpretation jurists say: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is arguing with her mother, then This vision indicates that there are many problems in her life, and this vision indicates that the married woman suffers from problems and many things that would make the mother dissatisfied. However, if the married woman sees that she is arguing with her husband, this indicates that she will face a lot of trouble and great sadness in her life. Her life, and this vision also shows that she is suffering from a lot of pressure in her life. But if a married woman sees that she is quarreling with her family and cursing them, this indicates that there will be a big quarrel in her life, and this vision shows slander, hatred, and severe temptation. A lot of negative emotions and a lot of hatred and envy. If a woman sees that she is arguing with her mother and there is a big fight between them, then this vision indicates that there will be a fight, but after that the relationships will return to being good and strong as they were. Interpretation of seeing a quarrel with the mother in A pregnant woman’s dream: Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing quarrels and fights in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she is suffering from severe pressure and tension, and this vision shows that she is suffering from fear of childbirth and her health. However, if she sees that there are major differences between her and her husband, this indicates that her life Unstable in reality and this may be a result of the stress and fatigue of pregnancy

title: Interpretation of murder in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Murder in a dream is one of the most disturbing dreams that a person can dream of, and it can sometimes represent a disturbing nightmare in the event that someone you love is killed in reality, because this causes curiosity and anxiety in this type of dream. In fact, murder is shameful and indicates the criminality of its perpetrator, and it may God forbade it in His Noble Book by saying: “Do not kill the soul that God has forbidden except with justice,” and that is the result of that. There are many motives, the most important of which is revenge, jealousy, or other thefts and other purposes. But what about his presence in the dream? Does this indicate that something disturbing will happen to the dreamer? You will learn this through an encyclopedia that presents to you today the most prominent interpretations of this dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaning for married, pregnant and unmarried women. Interpretation of murder in a dream by Ibn Sirin Murder in a dream indicates success in real life because it shows kindness and blessing to the dreamer. In the event that the dreamer finds that he has failed In the process of killing, this explains his failure in reality as well. Murder in a dream also indicates feelings of jealousy that the dreamer has and his desire to become better than the person he kills. Seeing a murder in a dream means that the dreamer will get rid of the sorrows that he feels in reality. If The dreamer finds that he is killing someone peacefully, this is his interpretation that he will obtain a prestigious position at work. Whoever finds in his dream that he is involved in a murder and the police failed to arrest him, this is his interpretation that in reality he will be able to achieve great success. Whoever sees in his dream that he is killing A wild animal, this interpretation is good, as it indicates that he will obtain money in the future, and God knows best. If the dreamer finds himself killing someone with bullets, this is his interpretation that he will soon obtain a source of livelihood. If the dreamer finds that he has died in a dream, this interpretation warns him of the necessity of dealing with With the problems that he faces in his life so as not to cause him misfortunes. If the dreamer finds that he is fleeing from those who kill him, this in reality indicates that he will be able to overcome many of the obstacles that he faces in reality. If the dreamer finds that he witnessed a murder in a dream, then this In reality, it means the death of one of his relatives or friends, and God knows best. Recurring a dream of murder in a dream indicates that the dreamer is facing many psychological problems, along with many difficulties in his life. Interpretation of murder in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman finds herself killing her husband in In a dream, it means that she will become pregnant soon. Seeing a woman killing her husband in a dream shows how much he loves and cares for him in reality. Interpretation of a murder in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is killing her husband, this means that she will soon give birth to a girl. In the event that she finds pregnant If she kills another person, this means that her birth in reality will be easy and her child will be healthy, and God knows best. Interpretation of murder in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is killing someone in defense of herself, this means that she will get married soon. Seeing a single woman kill a man in a dream It means that he will have a relationship and get married soon

title: Interpretation of seeing a bank in a dream

preview.html: The bank is the place designated for saving money and investing, so seeing the bank in a dream can be related to the financial aspects of the dreamer or it can be related to many other signs and indicators, so I will explain to you what the dream interpreters reported to see the bank in the dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about soap in a dream.. Promotion and financial gains. Interpretation of entering a bank in a dream for a man: A man entering a large bank can indicate abundance of livelihood and obtaining a lot of money in the coming period. If the dreamer is in debt at that time, then the appearance of the bank in the dream For him, it could be one of the signs of spending these debts and getting rid of them. The bank that appears in a man’s dream is one of the signs of a change in the current job in which the dreamer works in another, better job. Entering a bank in a man’s dream is a sign of profit in the field of trade, if he is the owner The dream is working in trade. Interpretation of seeing a crown in a dream... intelligence and the birth of a girl. Indications for seeing a bank in an unmarried girl’s dream. If a bank appears in an unmarried girl’s dream, this may indicate that girl’s marriage to a wealthy man who will fulfill all her desires for her. It could be A bank in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of the quick fulfillment of this girl’s dreams and desires. A girl’s entry into a bank or bank may indicate a formal approach to dealing with this girl, especially if she is not in a relationship. The girl put a lot of money in the bank, this may indicate The large amount of charitable work carried out by this girl in that period of her life. Interpretation of seeing a dream about bathing in a dream... the death of the disease and the delivery of pregnancy soon. What the interpreters said about seeing the bank in a married woman’s dream. The bank in a married woman’s dream is considered a sign of the financial stability in which she lives. In which this lady is in her life. The bank in a married woman’s dream could be one of the signs that this lady will spend a long time in trouble in her life at this stage. If you see iron safes in the bank in a married woman’s dream, this may indicate that there are many pressures And the problems that negatively affect the spirit of this woman. If the bank that appeared in the dream of a pregnant woman is filled with a lot of money, this may be good news for her that her fetus will be a male child who will have a lot in society, God willing. Also, the bank is in the dream of a working married woman. It is one of the indicators of this woman’s rise in her current job and gaining a distinguished position in the coming days. Interpretation of dreams about giving a dead person in a dream... illicit money and the return of lost things. The meaning of seeing a bank in a dream for a young man: When the bank appears in a young man’s dream, this may indicate that this young man will achieve Dreams and aspirations that he seeks. If the dreamer is not in a relationship, then the bank in his dream may be a sign of his relationship with a good girl in the coming days. Dream interpreters confirm that the bank in a young man’s dream in general can be a sign of many major changes

title: Television in a dream and the meaning of watching television in a dream

preview.html: Watching television in a dream has many interpretations from various scholars, some of which are good and bad, and in this article we aim to present most cases of watching television in a dream and their interpretations, so follow us. Television in a dreamWatching television in a dream can be a sign of imagination and illusion. Watching television in a dream The dream means the arrival of happy news in the dreamer’s next life. The interpretation of watching television in a dream indicates the viewer’s strength, courage, and good luck. The interpretation of watching television in a dream indicates great knowledge of the viewer and his relationship with people. Watching television in a dream can also indicate deviating from the truth and the act of lying. The interpretation of a dream about a TV can also express the subconscious actions of the viewer in his work. Seeing a new TV in a dream symbolizes anxiety and illusion in the dreamer’s life. Seeing an old TV in a dream indicates the dreamer’s fears that he suffers from and faces problems in his life. Watching a big TV in A dream means severe pain that the dreamer will suffer. Seeing a small TV in a dream may indicate the end of worry and worry. Seeing a broken TV in a dream for a man may indicate his inability to achieve his goals. Seeing a gift TV in a dream for a man is a sign of disagreements and problems between him and his family members. Watching a horror movie on television in a dream is a sign of bad news that will disturb the dreamer. See also: Seeing a famous person in a dream Interpretations of a naked dream Interpretation of a dream about television for a single woman Seeing and hearing happy news on television in a dream indicates a specific event in the dreamer’s life. Watching useful programs on television for individuals symbolizes their arrival at the ambitions they seek. Seeing the fall of television and the boom of television in a single woman’s dream is evidence of the viewer’s pessimism in the affairs of her life. To dream that he is wasting time watching television for the sake of single women, may mean that he lives in Illusions and does not think about reality. Interpretation of a dream about appearing on television. Interpretation of a dream about appearing on television for the viewer, indicating his fame in his work, his high status and power, and his love for the world. Interpretation of a dream about someone appearing on television can also symbolize the presence of a problem that will develop for the worse. It indicates Interpretation of a dream about appearing on a television screen in a dream indicates that the dreamer is experiencing disagreements and disturbances with members of the work. Buying a TV in a dream Interpretation of dreams to buy a new television in a dream is a sign that the fortuneteller’s condition will change for the worse, and from another point of view it is a sign of illness. It may Seeing buying a TV in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is going through problems and troubles in worldly matters. Seeing buying a TV in a dream also indicates a deterioration in the dreamer’s material and living conditions. Watching TV in a dreamWatching TV in a dream means that the dreamer is looking for new ways to change his situation. It shows Interpretation of watching television in a dream for a married woman: some complex issues that confront her

title: Indications: We saw a child being beaten in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Beating a child in a dream. Children are among the most beautiful blessings that God - Glory be to Him - gives to His servants. They are the adornment of this worldly life, and through them life is purified and happiness spreads in the home, so they must be raised with good upbringing, so that they will be a good role model in the future, and a reason for entering Paradise, but some parents beat their children out of faith, and among them this is a good method of education, but it negatively affects their personality. . The world of dreams, in this article we will mention whether hitting a child in a dream is a good or bad sign. Hitting a child in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of hitting a child has many interpretations, the most important of which are the following: If one sees in a dream that he is hitting a familiar child, this is a sign that he has harmed This child is harming him and he must stop doing so. If someone sees during his sleep that he is hitting a child with his hand, this is a sign that he will abandon his work during this period. Hitting a child in a dream leads to sins, committing forbidden things, and distancing oneself from God Almighty, and it contains advice for returning to the truth. And repentance from committing sins and disobedience. If an unmarried young man dreams that he is hitting a child with his hands, this proves that he will soon connect with a girl and then break up with her. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Hitting a child in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin mentioned Sirin - may God have mercy on him - that hitting a child in a dream indicates many things, the most important of which is what can be clarified through the following: Seeing a child being beaten in a dream indicates the corruption of the dreamer’s morals, so he needs to change himself and stop harming himself and others around him. If she sees during her sleep that she slapped a child in the face, then this is a sign of God’s satisfaction with him and the ample livelihood that he enjoys, and the great feeling of happiness, peace of mind, blessings and blessings. If a father dreams that he hits his son with his hands, this proves his great love for his children and his good upbringing of them. Whoever sees In his dream that he beats a strange child without clothes, the dream symbolizes his discovery of something he knows he is hiding. Beating a child in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about a child hitting a single woman is that he must think about things before making any decision these days, and if the child he hit does not know him This is an indication that he is a random person and needs to organize her life. If a girl sees in her dream that she is hitting a familiar child, this indicates her interest in him and her feeling of fear for him from any harm or evil, and her desire to advise him to do the right thing. If she sees an unmarried woman in a dream She hits her child with her hands, but it does not hurt her and she does not cry. This leads her to face some disputes within her family, which causes her a lot of anxiety and sadness. If the sister sees during her sleep that she is hitting her little sister with her hands, this proves her affection for her and her continuous effort to make her happy and work for her comfort. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is hitting a child in the face, this is a sign of goodness coming to her from a stranger. Hitting a child in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is hitting her children, this indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a family member betraying him in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: A girl being betrayed is one of the things that can cause her a deep wound in her feelings, although many girls may not have gone through this experience, but seeing a single woman betraying a lover in a dream is a common vision. For many girls and that is why we will explain to you the opinions of dream interpreters about this vision. Interpretation of a dream about crying in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s betrayal of an unmarried woman. A large group of dream interpreters confirms that betrayal of a lover is a sign of fidelity and intense love that characterizes this lover. For this girl. Seeing a girl being betrayed by her lover indicates the problem of low self-confidence in the dreamer, which makes her see this vision. Seeing a lover betraying an unmarried girl indicates that this girl will find a good job that she wants to work in. Interpretation of seeing a bag in a dream. Interpretation of seeing betrayal in a dream for a single woman: Betrayal by friends in a dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into a financial problem or psychological crisis. As for betrayal in the field of work in which this girl works, it could be one of the indications that this girl will obtain a distinguished position in this job. And she will obtain a new presidential position there. A lover’s betrayal of an unmarried girl may indicate the approaching formal bond between her and this lover. Interpretation of a dream about Hajj in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about her lover’s betrayal in a man’s dream. Ibn Sirin believes that a man’s betrayal is a sign that this man will fall into calamity or trouble. A major sin that is difficult for him to get out of. A man’s betrayal of his wife in a dream indicates that this man has committed a major sin in his life and he may feel remorse for this sin. The betrayal that appears in a man’s dream may indicate that this man is being betrayed by those close to him, whether Whether they are family or friends. If the dreamer has a prestigious job, then seeing betrayal in the dream may indicate a loss of power or influence, or perhaps leaving the current job he works in. Interpretation of a dream about rooms in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a friend betraying her lover? Al-Nabulsi said that seeing an unmarried girl cheating on her lover in a dream may be a sign of the instability of the emotional relationship that this girl is experiencing during this period. Betrayal in the unmarried girl’s dream of her lover indicates the dreamer’s failure to achieve the goals and desires he seeks. Some interpreters say A girl who commits treason in a dream is in reality abandoning her principles and committing many wrong or prohibited actions that can produce negative results. Interpretation of a dream about a train in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of betrayal of friends in a dream of an unmarried girlIf the owner of the dream is betrayed by a friend, This means that she will suffer from not achieving her dreams. The betrayal coming from her colleagues may indicate that this girl failed her studies this year and got bad grades. If an unmarried girl sees that she is being betrayed between her lover and one of her friends throughout her life, this indicates that in reality
